metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6175 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
Eval injection vulnerability in php-gettext 1.0.12 and earlier allowsremote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via a crafted plural formsheader.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6175` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-php-gettext - 1.0.12-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: php-gettext package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.12-1').
